reviewText: When I ordered this dvd I did it with a little of apprehension based on the last customer review. However, I received an excellent dvd; original box excellent picture, sound etc. And now I learn more about the legendary Garrincha el zurdo do oro

cover print looks very faded and pixelated, like an obvious bootleg. no menu,no language settings, no bonus, spanish audio only ( the inside cover says bonus features and original portuguese audio). very disappointed.
